verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH6918>, Ye shall be holy; for I Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430> am holy <WH6918>.
Ye shall fear <WH3372> every man <WH376> his mother <WH517>, and his father <WH1>; and ye shall keep <WH8104> my sabbaths <WH7676>: I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>.
Turn <WH6437> ye not unto idols <WH457>, nor make <WH6213> to yourselves molten <WH4541> gods <WH430>: I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>.
And when ye offer <WH2076> a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace-offerings <WH8002> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, ye shall offer <WH2076> it that ye may be accepted <WH7522>.

It shall be eaten <WH398> the same day <WH3117> ye offer <WH2077> it <WH4283>, and on the morrow: and if aught remain <WH3498> until the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, it shall be burnt <WH8313> with fire <WH784>.
And if it be eaten <WH398> at all <WH398> on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, it is an abomination <WH6292>; it shall not be accepted <WH7521>:

but every one that eateth <WH398> it shall bear <WH5375> his iniquity <WH5771>, because he hath profaned <WH2490> the holy thing <WH6944> of Jehovah <WH3068>: and that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people <WH5971>.

And when ye reap <WH7114> the harvest <WH7105> of your land <WH776>, thou shalt not wholly reap <WH3615> the corners <WH6285> of thy field <WH7704>, neither shalt thou gather <WH3950> the gleaning <WH3951> of thy harvest <WH7105>.

And thou shalt not glean <WH5953> thy vineyard <WH3754>, neither shalt thou gather <WH3950> the fallen fruit <WH6528> of thy vineyard <WH3754>; thou shalt leave <WH5800> them for the poor <WH6041> and for the sojourner <WH1616>: I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>.
Ye shall not steal <WH1589>; neither shall ye deal falsely <WH3584>, nor lie <WH8266> one <WH376> to another <WH5997>.
And ye shall not swear <WH7650> by my name <WH8034> falsely <WH8267>, and profane <WH2490> the name <WH8034> of thy God <WH430>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
Thou shalt not oppress <WH6231> thy neighbor <WH7453>, nor rob <WH1497> him <WH6468>: the wages of a hired <WH7916> servant shall not abide <WH3885> with thee all night until the morning <WH1242>.
Thou shalt not curse <WH7043> the deaf <WH2795>, nor put <WH5414> a stumblingblock <WH4383> before <WH6440> the blind <WH5787>; but thou shalt fear <WH3372> thy God <WH430>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.

Ye shall do <WH6213> no unrighteousness <WH5766> in judgment <WH4941>: thou shalt not respect <WH5375> the person <WH6440> of the poor <WH1800>, nor honor <WH1921> the person <WH6440> of the mighty <WH1419>; but in righteousness <WH6664> shalt thou judge <WH8199> thy neighbor <WH5997>.

Thou shalt not go <WH3212> up and down as a talebearer <WH7400> among thy people <WH5971>: neither shalt thou stand <WH5975> against the blood <WH1818> of thy neighbor <WH7453>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
Thou shalt not hate <WH8130> thy brother <WH251> in thy heart <WH3824>: thou shalt surely <WH3198> rebuke <WH3198> thy neighbor <WH5997>, and not bear <WH5375> sin because of him <WH2399>.

Thou shalt not take vengeance <WH5358>, nor bear any grudge <WH5201> against the children <WH1121> of thy people <WH5971>; but thou shalt love <WH157> thy neighbor <WH7453> as thyself <WH3644>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.

Ye shall keep <WH8104> my statutes <WH2708>. Thou shalt not let thy cattle <WH929> gender <WH7250> with a diverse kind <WH3610>: thou shalt not sow <WH2232> thy field <WH7704> with two kinds of seed <WH3610>: neither shall there come <WH5927> upon thee a garment <WH899> of two kinds <WH3610> of stuff mingled together <WH8162>.

And whosoever <WH376> lieth <WH7901> carnally <WH2233> with a woman <WH802>, that is a bondmaid <WH8198>, betrothed <WH2778> to a husband <WH376>, and not at all <WH6299> redeemed <WH6299>, nor freedom <WH2668> given <WH5414> her <WH1244>; they shall be punished; they shall not be put to death <WH4191>, because she was not free <WH2666>.
And he shall bring <WH935> his trespass-offering <WH817> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, unto the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, even a ram <WH352> for a trespass-offering <WH817>.

And the priest <WH3548> shall make atonement <WH3722> for him with the ram <WH352> of the trespass-offering <WH817> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> for his sin <WH2403> which he hath sinned <WH2398>: and the sin <WH2403> which he hath sinned <WH2398> shall be forgiven him <WH5545>.

And when ye shall come <WH935> into the land <WH776>, and shall have planted <WH5193> all manner of trees <WH6086> for food <WH3978>, then ye shall count <WH6188> the fruit <WH6529> thereof as their uncircumcision <WH6188>: three <WH7969> years <WH8141> shall they be as uncircumcised <WH6189> unto you <WH398>; it shall not be eaten.
But in the fourth <WH7243> year <WH8141> all the fruit <WH6529> thereof shall be holy <WH6944>, for giving praise <WH1974> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.
And in the fifth <WH2549> year <WH8141> shall ye eat <WH398> of the fruit <WH6529> thereof <WH3254>, that it may yield unto you the increase <WH8393> thereof <WH3068>: I am Jehovah your God <WH430>.
Ye shall not eat <WH398> anything with the blood <WH1818>: neither shall ye use enchantments <WH5172>, nor practise augury <WH6049>.
Ye shall not round <WH5362> the corners <WH6285> of your heads <WH7218>, neither shalt thou mar <WH7843> the corners <WH6285> of thy beard <WH2206>.
Ye shall not make <WH5414> any <WH3793> cuttings <WH8296> in your flesh <WH1320> for the dead <WH5315>, nor print <WH5414> any marks <WH7085> upon you <WH3068>: I am Jehovah.
Profane <WH2490> not thy daughter <WH1323>, to make her a harlot <WH2490>; lest the land <WH776> fall to whoredom <WH2181>, and the land <WH776> become full <WH4390> of wickedness <WH2154>.
Ye shall keep <WH8104> my sabbaths <WH7676>, and reverence <WH3372> my sanctuary <WH4720>; I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
Turn <WH6437> ye not unto them that have familiar spirits <WH178>, nor unto the wizards <WH3049>; seek <WH1245> them not out <WH2930>, to be defiled by them <WH3068>: I am Jehovah your God <WH430>.
Thou shalt rise up <WH6965> before <WH6440> the hoary head <WH7872>, and honor <WH1921> the face <WH6440> of the old man <WH2205>, and thou shalt fear <WH3372> thy God <WH430>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
And if a stranger <WH1616> sojourn <WH1481> with thee in your land <WH776>, ye shall not do him wrong <WH3238>.

The stranger <WH1616> that sojourneth <WH1481> with you shall be unto you as the home-born <WH249> among you <WH157>, and thou shalt love him as thyself <WH1616>; for ye were sojourners in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>.
Ye shall do <WH6213> no unrighteousness <WH5766> in judgment <WH4941>, in measures <WH4884> of length <WH4948>, of weight, or of quantity <WH4884>.

Just <WH6664> balances <WH3976>, just <WH6664> weights <WH68>, a just <WH6664> ephah <WH374>, and a just <WH6664> hin <WH1969>, shall ye have <WH3068>: I am Jehovah your God <WH430>, who brought you out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And ye shall observe <WH8104> all my statutes <WH2708>, and all mine ordinances <WH4941>, and do <WH6213> them <WH3068>: I am Jehovah.
